duties_responsibilities.duty: Greet employees, announce clients and visitors, issue visitor passes, validate parking, and receive incoming calls.
Coordinate and support delivery of workplace services, manage room bookings, AV support, and maintain awareness of the workspace.
Respond to customer requests and complaints with accurate and detailed information, follow security and emergency procedures, and maintain records of vendors' proof of insurance.
Deliver orientations, tours of facilities, and instructions on work order submission and supply storage.
Perform other duties as assigned by the supervisor.
